lead_paragraph: Aston Villa defender Eric Lichaj and Schalke midfielder Jermaine Jones were selected for the 20-man roster for the United States’ exhibitions against Poland and Colombia next month.
snippet: Aston Villa defender Eric Lichaj and Schalke midfielder Jermaine Jones were selected for the 20-man roster for the United States’ exhibitions against Poland and Colombia next month.

headline.main: United States Selects Roster for Exhibitions
headline.print_headline: United States Selects Roster For Exhibitions
